text: Yak dlya tsykh khto dayutʹsya tverdyy dokaz z yikhnʹoho Lorda, dopovidayutʹsya svidkom z Yoho, ta ranishe yomu, knyha Moses vstanovyla precedent ta myloserdya, vony bezsumnivno poviryatʹ. Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve sered riznomanitnykh hrup, Peklo ochikuye yikh. Ne havanʹ budʹ-yakyy sumniv; tse yavlyaye soboyu pravdu z vashoho Lorda, ale naybilʹsh lyudey disbelieve
